      • tokenProcess

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> tokenProcess(java.lang.String docText,
                                                      int options)
        This method will tokenize by using one of three different tokenizer (Stanford CoreNLP, Stanford Lemma, Naive White Spaced) according to parameter 'option'
        Parameters:
        docText - The untokenized text of document.
        options - The option to specify the target tokenizer
        Returns:
